description: A health and flavour bomb! Chilli salmon on wild and brown rice with vibrant veggies and sesame soy dressing.
name: Chilli Salmon Wild Rice Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 190 g John West Salmon Tempter - Chilli
250 g microwave brown and wild rice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine remaining ingredients in a screw top jar to make a dressing. Shake well. Pour over rice bowls and serve.
